thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com
thread.title: J. Hynes Omaha NE
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by J. Hynes Omaha NE

author: J. Hynes Omaha NE
title: J. Hynes Omaha NE
text: I am not accustomed to making such large purchases unseen and was skeptical of all sites at first and then I started checking customer and BBB reviews of the companies that I narrowed down. I chose Street Smart and could not be more pleased transmission arrived looked great and there were no issues with install and shipping core back I would highly recommend this company for purchases.
